<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Safety Landing Page ITIL">147e012647671110ed09bfc7536d4351</macroponent><name>dropdown_1/items</name><preset/><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function evaluateProperty({api,helpers}) {
    var jsonObj = api.data.aggregation_query_1.output;
    var numOfLoc = jsonObj.data.GlideAggregate_Query.length;
    var jsonVar = "[";
    for (var i = 0; i < numOfLoc; i++) {
        jsonVar = jsonVar + '{"id":"' +
            jsonObj.data.GlideAggregate_Query[i].groupBy[0].value + '","label":"' +
            jsonObj.data.GlideAggregate_Query[i].groupBy[0].displayValue + '"}';
        if (i < (numOfLoc - 1)) {
            jsonVar = jsonVar + ",";
        }
    }
    jsonVar = jsonVar + ']'; 
     console.log(jsonVar);
    return jsonVar;
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-12-06 18:18:51</sys_created_on><sys_id>19727d2647e71110ed09bfc7536d434a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>dropdown_1/items</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Safety" source="x_619426_safety">f8e9842647631110ed09bfc7536d43e3</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Safety">f8e9842647631110ed09bfc7536d43e3</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_19727d2647e71110ed09bfc7536d434a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-12-06 18:18:51</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
